mapper.select: SELECT u.notice_id, u.notice_title, u.notice_content, u.release_time, u.notice_status, t.flag as flag FROM ucc_notice AS u LEFT JOIN ucc_notice_trace as t on u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE 1=1 and u.notice_type = #{noticeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from ucc_notice a LEFT JOIN (select * from ucc_notice_trace where user_id =#{userId} ) c on c.notice_id = a.notice_id where c.flag is null
select count(*) from ucc_notice a LEFT JOIN (select * from ucc_notice_trace where user_id =#{userId} ) c on c.notice_id = a.notice_id where c.flag is null and a.notice_type='1'
